NEW YORK, NY--(Marketwired - Oct 27, 2015) - "New To The Street" was pleased with its latest production series filmed at their state of the art studio in NYC on October 22, 2015. This taping showcased for the first time, Daniel de Liege, CEO of Alliance BioEnergy + (OTCQB: ALLM), Tony Chiodo, CEO of Soul and Vibe Interactive, (OTCQB: SOUL), and Eric Bagdikian, President of Code 3, Inc., a global disaster recovery animal rescue company. "New To The Street" did an introductory interview with Richard Schumacher, CEO of Pressure BioSciences, Inc., (OTCQB: PBIO). This taping also highlighted updates from George Jarjour, COO of Seen on Screen TV, Inc., (OTCQB: SONT), and Keith Evola and Jeanne Wagner from KTE Services. "'New To The Street' is delighted to not only showcase public companies, but is excited about the addition of private companies sharing their stories on the 'New To The Street' platform. The sky is definitely not the limit," says Vince Caruso, President of "New To The Street." "New To The Street" looks forward to the next taping on December 3, 2015, showcasing these companies: "New To The Street" will be implementing ALL these program interviews with Twitter (NYSE: TWTR) in its video marketing beta program. About New To The Street "New To The Street" paves the way to the latest financial issues, offering a blend of business and financial services news reporting and in-depth interviews relating to new products, economic analysis and public company profiles. "New To The Street" is produced by FMW Media Works Corp. a leading provider of business profiles and corporate special programming, and airs as paid-programming on select stations nationwide potentially reaching more than 95 million homes. Visit www.newtothestreet.com.
